sqlMap.insert: insert into CMS_ARTICLE (ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, COLUMN_ID, CREATE_TIME, PUBLISH_TIME, AUDIT_TIME, CREATOR, IS_TOP, STATE, VIEWS, CONTENT, SUMMARY, TN_PATH, AUDITOR,WORD_PATH,FILENAME) values (CONCAT('ca',nextval('SEQ_ARTICLE_ID')), #title#, #author#, #columnId#, SYSDATE(), #publishTime#, #auditTime#, #creator#, #isTop#, #state#, #views#, #content#, #summary#, #tnPath#, #auditor#, #wordPath#,#filename#)

insert into CMS_ARTICLE (ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, COLUMN_ID, CREATE_TIME, PUBLISH_TIME, AUDIT_TIME, CREATOR, IS_TOP, STATE, VIEWS, CONTENT, SUMMARY, TN_PATH, AUDITOR,WORD_PATH,FILENAME) values (CONCAT('c',nextval('SEQ_ARTICLE_ID')), #title#, #author#, #columnId#, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), 'admin', '1', '1', #views#, #content#, #summary#, #tnPath#, #auditor#, #wordPath#,#filename#)
